title.rendered: Andre Farr awards Vada Manager in Las Vegas at The Million Dollar Executive Dinner presented by Executive Member Group (EMG). John Rogers and Tabetha Plummer announced as 2025 Honorees slated for New Orleans

content.rendered:
LOS ANGELES, Feb. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The Million Dollar Executive Dinner hosted by Andre Farr held in Las Vegas, Nevada on Saturday, February 10, 2024 was a night to remember. This ultra-exclusive fete at Picasso inside the Bellagio, was the most elegant event of the Super Bowl Weekend. 

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/andre-farr-awards-vada-manager-in-las-vegas-at-the-million-dollar-executive-dinner-presented-by-executive-member-group-emg-john-rogers-and-tabetha-plummer-announced-as-2025-honorees-slated-for-new-orleans-302062152.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

This ultra-exclusive fete at Picasso inside the Bellagio, was the most elegant event of the Super Bowl Weekend.  Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/andre-farr-awards-vada-manager-in-las-vegas-at-the-million-dollar-executive-dinner-presented-by-executive-member-group-emg-john-rogers-and-tabetha-plummer-announced-as-2025-honorees-slated-for-new-orleans-302062152.html Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
